import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { AuthService } from '../auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-participant-sidebar', templateUrl: './participant-sidebar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./participant-sidebar.component.css'] }) export class ParticipantSidebarComponent { constructor(private authService: AuthService, private router: Router) {} logout() { this.authService.logout(); // remove token this.router.navigate(['/signin']); // redirect to signin } }
